DataElement.preferredName: Person Prior Treatment Regimen Nitrosourea Compound Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to a person having completed a prior therapy regimen with a group of anticancer drugs that can cross the blood-brain barrier, as an elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Prior Treatment Regimen Nitrosourea Compound Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person having completed a prior therapy regimen with a group of anticancer drugs that can cross the blood-brain barrier, as an elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredName: Prior Treatment Regimen Nitrosourea Compound Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.:A group of anticancer drugs that can cross the blood-brain barrier. Carmustine (BCNU) and lomustine (CCNU) are nitrosoureas.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.
Any of a class of alkylating agents that contain both a nitroso group and a urea. They are lipophilic and can cross the blood-brain barrier.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text4
